entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Buchans
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5.
